attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Please relent, resore the 10p rate!'
The recent change abolishing the 10p rate for those on low incomes comes as AN ADDITIONAL BLOW to individuals already struggling to cope with the rising cost of living. I am single under 60 years old and medically retired, receiving a very small pension of less than £8.000. I expect to be about about £100.00 worse off. I am surprised that a Labour government; of all things, should preside over policies that penalize the poorest people in our society. I urge the gorvernment to be reasonable &
'Please relent,reinstate the 10p rate'!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
